dom:
<input aria-autocomplete="both" aria-haspopup="false" autocomplete="off" class="input-text" data-mage-init='{"quicksearch":{
                              "formselector":"#search_mini_form",
                              "url":"https://www.simplehuman.com/search/ajax/suggest/",
                              "destinationselector":"#search_autocomplete"}
                         }' id="search" maxlength="128" name="q" role="combobox" type="text" value=""/>

feature: first name text first name firstname
last name text last name lastname
email address text e mail address email
